messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Denise's House is There!
messages.msgSnippet: That s brilliant news.. I am in the UK but I am thinking about you all and seeing it on the news....... feel very lucky myself. Really, really terrible.
messages.messageBody:
That's brilliant news.. I am in the UK but I am thinking about you all and seeing it on the news....... feel very lucky myself. Really, really terrible. Similar scenes to the tusanmi. No words really.

Ruth


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Denise's House is There!
messages.msgSnippet: Denise s house is there.  Part of the roof came off which flooded the attic and seeped into the master bedroom but that s it!  Even their car is there and
messages.messageBody:
Denise's house is there. Part of the roof came off which flooded the
attic and seeped into the master bedroom but that's it! Even their car
is there and working. Many downed trees but a little red bud tree she
planted is doing fine. They've got a generator and their water supply
is fine. Lots of canned goods. They're amazed and grateful.
.Amazing!!

She thinks she'll be able to get on line but I wanted everyone to know
as soon as possible. She thanks everyone for their good thoughts.
She's amazingly resilient considering the situation.. So many people
need our help right now.
Alison
